casebody.data:
Carpenter, Appellant, v. United Ohio Insurance Company, Appellee, et al.

[Cite as Carpenter v. United Ohio Ins. Co. (2001), 92 Ohio St.3d 213.]

*214(No. 00-2241 Submitted May 16, 2001 Decided July 5, 2001.) Elk & Elk Co., L.P.A., and Todd O. Rosenberg, for appellant. Williams & Petro Co., L.L.C., John P. Petro and Steven E. Herman, for appellee.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Littrell v. Wigglesworth (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 425, 746 N.E.2d 1077, and Clark v. Scarpelli (2001), 91 Ohio St.3d 271, 744 N.E.2d 719.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur. Cook, J., concurs in judgment.
